Question: Lordsystem CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lordsystem

CES 2024

- Product: Trip.PASS-Mobile passport platform
- Category: Financial Technologies
- A mobile passport platform designed to streamline and enhance the travel experience
- Innovatively addresses global challenges in travel and mobility
- Part of the CES 2024 Innovation Awards honorees
Summary_cn:
领主系统

CES 2024

- 产品：Trip.PASS-Mobile护照平台
- 类别：金融科技
- 一种旨在简化和提升旅行体验的移动护照平台
- 创新地应对全球旅行和流动性方面的挑战
- 作为CES 2024创新奖的获奖者之一
